title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the project scope, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and user stories for the assistantPersonnalisationProduit project.

title: Design AI Model Architecture
description: Design the architecture of the AI model that will power the personalization assistant, including data inputs, processing stages, and output.

title: Develop AI Model
description: Implement the designed AI model according to the project requirements.

title: Develop Frontend Interface
description: Create the user interface for the assistant, allowing users to interact with it and see personalized product recommendations.

title: Integrate AI Model with Frontend Interface
description: Connect the developed AI model with the frontend interface to enable personalized product recommendations.

title: Conduct Quality Assurance Tests
description: Test the functionality of the assistantPersonnalisationProduit to ensure it works as expected and provides accurate personalized product recommendations.
dependencies: Integrate AI Model with Frontend Interface

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Secure the assistantPersonnalisationProduit by implementing necessary security measures such as user authentication, data protection, and potential vulnerability mitigation.
dependencies: Integrate AI Model with Frontend Interface

title: Document Technical Details and User Guide for assistantPersonnalisationProduit
description: Write clear technical documentation for the assistantPersonnalisationProduit project, including detailed architecture diagrams, installation instructions, and usage guides for both developers and end-users. The documentation should be structured and easy to understand, with specific sections dedicated to each aspect of the system.
dependencies: Integrate AI Model with Frontend Interface
